records.context_note: A Frontex participant deployed in a redacted location in Bulgaria was hospitalized in Sofia Military Hospital with COVID-19 compatible symptoms. A COVID-19 test later returned negative. The person was discharged and sent to accommodation in Sofia, advised to remain one week without performing shifts as a preventive measure.
